caption: Bank of America has catching up to do
trend_summary: This chart compares the rebased share price performance of Bank of America, Citigroup, JPMorgan Chase, and Wells Fargo from Q1 2022 to Q1 2025. JPMorgan has been the strongest performer, followed by Wells Fargo. Citigroup and Bank of America have significantly underperformed their peers, with Bank of America being the weakest performer for most of the period shown.
author: pan.yuk@ft.com
article_title: Bank of America still paying the price for being too careful
